Name: CosmoOdyssey 2: Comeback to origin
About the game: Near future. You play as the agronomist immigrant Taras Bulbenko from the Kharkiv region, who is hiding from enemies in Canada and is hunted by a creditor. Your task is to survive alone, doing ordinary peasant things. The game is waiting for you: - Lonely typical village life; - Planting potatoes; - Planting sunflowers, watermelons, beets; - Fishing; - Diving; - Pest control from the garden; - Injuries in the household; - Brewing moonshine; - Contact with extraterrestrial civilizations; - Kharkiv city. In addition to this: - A large number of references to modernity with highlights; - Full Ukrainian voiceover with some elements of Slobid dialect. Also if Taras Bulbenko was in space, on Earth he remains as an agronomist from the village of Rohan. You will plant plants genetically modified by Taras, feed a small farm, swim underwater to find unique plants, cool off in the river after a working day, breaw and drink moonshine, and even poison a Colorado beetle. With the accompaniment of sounds familiar to many of us.
